assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText3
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: This manual and the policies and procedures contained herein supersede any and all prior practices, oral or written representations, or statements regarding the terms and conditions of your employment with [Company Name]. By distributing this handbook, [Company Name] expressly revokes any and all previous policies and procedures which are inconsistent with those contained herein.
